text: Hey, HEY! What do you think you are doing?
I'm not just going to let ANYONE pull me up!
You got to be special, ya know?
Or rich, that would work too.
Ya got some coin? If you have 10 coins, I can get you a deal.
Oh, not quite enough in your pocket.

It should be better at dealing with multiple enemies 
than that knife you got.
Upset you can't weild me yet?
Or maybe I won't make it to the final build.
